https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kYLGUFqmqXDWEKzDsLrJ9JB2fLE.jpg This important, patient documentary follows a year in the life of the sidings dwellers who eke out a living, begging, foraging, stealing and sleeping rough near the Baoji railway station in Shaanxi. Along the Railway
